typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		fruit as string,
		size as string,
		color as string,
		datetime as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> MongoExportedFile
MongoExportedFile aggregate(groupBy(fruit,
		{} = ERROR_FUNCTION('')),
	fruit = fruit,
		datetime = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		fruit = Aggregate1@fruit,
		size,
		color,
		datetime
	)) ~> TransformedFile
